attributes.action: End Southern Railway (Govia) franchise. Award suburban London routes to TfL.
attributes.background: (Govia Thameslink Railway) franchise are providing an unacceptable level of service to their passengers on the Southern Rail Network.We are calling for their removal and replacement by TfL for all suburban London routes.

rejection.details:
The Government has announced a new partnership with TfL:

https://www.gov.uk/government/news/transport-secretary-and-mayor-set-out-vision-for-rail-travel-across-london-and-the-south-east

If you would like the Government to take a different action, you could start a new petition asking specifically for the change you would like to happen.
